#summary Human Spinal Thoracic Nerves
[Home] -> [BiologicalLifeResearch] -> [HumanNerves] -> [HumanNervesSpinalThoracic]
----

This page is intended to list thoracic spinal cord nerves of biological human, which connect mind to human limbs and visceral organs.

<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

Coverage verified by:
  * http://medical-dictionary.thefreedictionary.com/nerve (name base)
  * http://www.oluwoleogunranti.com/course/course1/nerves (MA reference)

= THORACIC NERVES - MOTOR ROOTS =

   * *T1 nerve* (MA:[http://www.oluwoleogunranti.com/course/course1/nerves/ne26.htm T1 NERVE]); BRANCHES={Muscular branches - large (enters the brachial plexus) and a small branch (1st intercostal nerve)}
    * *T1 nerve, large branch*; MODALITY={motor}; FIBERS={GSE:[BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_MM Medial Motor Nucleus,BMA.SC.VH.MM] -> [BrainRegionTARGET_TEA_HAND Hand,TARGET.TEA.HAND]}
    * *first intercostal nerve* (small branch); DISTRIBUTION={1st rib}; MODALITY={motor}; FIBERS={GSE:[BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_MM Medial Motor Nucleus,BMA.SC.VH.MM] -> [BrainRegionTARGET_TEA_TRUNK Trunk,TARGET.TEA.TRUNK]}
    * <img src="http://dermatologic.com.ar/c1tt2.png">
   * *upper thoracic nerves* (thoracic intercostal nerves); MODALITY={motor}; FIBERS={GSE:[BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_MM Medial Motor Nucleus,BMA.SC.VH.MM] -> [BrainRegionTARGET_TEA_TRUNK Trunk,TARGET.TEA.TRUNK]}
    * *T2 nerve* (MA:[http://www.oluwoleogunranti.com/course/course1/nerves/ne27.htm T2 NERVE]); BRANCHES={Muscular branches - 2nd intercostal nerve}
    * *T3 nerve* (MA:[http://www.oluwoleogunranti.com/course/course1/nerves/ne28.htm T3 NERVE]); BRANCHES={Muscular branches - 3d intercostal nerve}
    * *T4 nerve* (MA:[http://www.oluwoleogunranti.com/course/course1/nerves/ne29.htm T4 NERVE]); BRANCHES={Muscular branches - 4th intercostal nerve}
    * *T5 nerve* (MA:[http://www.oluwoleogunranti.com/course/course1/nerves/ne30.htm T5 NERVE]); BRANCHES={Muscular branches - 5th intercostal nerve}
    * *T6 nerve* (MA:[http://www.oluwoleogunranti.com/course/course1/nerves/ne31.htm T6 NERVE]); BRANCHES={Muscular branches - 6th intercostal nerve}
    * <img src="http://www.rci.rutgers.edu/~uzwiak/AnatPhys/APFallLect10_files/image013.jpg">
   * *lower thoracic nerves* (thoracicoabdominal intercostal nerves); MODALITY={motor}; FIBERS={GSE:[BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_MM Medial Motor Nucleus,BMA.SC.VH.MM] -> [BrainRegionTARGET_TEA_TRUNK Trunk,TARGET.TEA.TRUNK]}
    * *T7 nerve* (MA:[http://www.oluwoleogunranti.com/course/course1/nerves/ne32.htm T7 NERVE]); BRANCHES={Muscular branches - 7th intercostal nerve}; DISTRIBUTION={supply muscles of abdomen - external oblique, internal oblique, transversus abdominis, rectus abdominis}
     * <img src="http://www.cutandjacked.com/sites/default/files/images/abs/manage_abs5.jpg">
    * *T8 nerve* (MA:[http://www.oluwoleogunranti.com/course/course1/nerves/ne33.htm T8 NERVE]); BRANCHES={Muscular branches - 8th intercostal nerve}; DISTRIBUTION={supply muscles of abdomen - external oblique, internal oblique, transversus abdominis, rectus abdominis}
    * *T9 nerve* (MA:[http://www.oluwoleogunranti.com/course/course1/nerves/ne34.htm T9 NERVE]); BRANCHES={Muscular branches - 9th intercostal nerve}; DISTRIBUTION={supplies muscles of anterior abdominal wall - internal oblique, transversus abdominis, rectus abdominis}
    * *T10 nerve* (MA:[http://www.oluwoleogunranti.com/course/course1/nerves/ne35.htm T10 NERVE]); BRANCHES={Muscular branches - 10th intercostal nerve}; DISTRIBUTION={supplies muscles of anterior abdominal wall - internal oblique, rectus abdominis, transversus abdominis}
    * *T11 nerve* (MA:[http://www.oluwoleogunranti.com/course/course1/nerves/ne36.htm T11 NERVE]); BRANCHES={Muscular branches - 11th intercostal nerve}; DISTRIBUTION={supplies muscles of anterior abdominal wall - internal oblique, rectus abdominis, transversus abdominis}
    * <img src="http://www.cixip.com/Public/kindeditor/attached/image/20121122/20121122104412_41232.jpg">
   * *T12 nerve* (MA:[http://www.oluwoleogunranti.com/course/course1/nerves/ne37.htm 12TH THORACIC NERVE]); BRANCHES={Muscular branches - subcostal nerve}; ; FIBERS={GSE:[BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_MM Medial Motor Nucleus,BMA.SC.VH.MM] -> [BrainRegionTARGET_TEA_TRUNK Trunk,TARGET.TEA.TRUNK]}
    * *Subcostal nerve* (MA:[http://www.oluwoleogunranti.com/course/course1/nerves/ne219.htm SUBCOSTAL NERVE]); BRANCHES={Muscular branches}; DISTRIBUTION={supplies muscles - internal oblique, transversus abdominis; communicates with the iliohypogastric nerve and then gives a branch to the pyramidalis}

= THORACIC NERVES - SENSORY ROOTS =

  * *intercostal nerves* (MA:[http://www.oluwoleogunranti.com/course/course1/nerves/intercostal.htm INTERCOSTAL NERVES]); ORIGIN={arise from anterior divisions (rami anteriores; ventral divisions) of the thoracic spinal nerves from T1 to T11}; BRANCHES={lateral cutaneous, anterior, posterior}
   * *intercostal nerves, lateral cutaneous branches*
    * *intercostal nerves, posterior lateral cutaneous branches*; DISTRIBUTION={run backward, and supply the skin over the scapula and Latissimus dorsi.run forward the side two way side of the muscular supply}; MODALITY={sensory}; FIBERS={GSA:[BrainRegionTARGET_TEA_HAND Hand,TARGET.TEA.HAND] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG_TX Thoracic Dorsal Root Ganglia,AVA.PN.SG.DRG.TX] -> [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_SG Substantia Gelatinosa,BMA.SC.PH.SG] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VP Ventral Posterolateral Nucleus,SMA.FD.TH.VPL]}
     * <img src="http://www.eorthopod.com/sites/default/files/images/adult_shoulder_fx_anatomy04.jpg">
    * *intercostal nerves, anterior lateral cutaneous branches*; DISTRIBUTION={run forward to the side and the forepart of the chest, supplying the skin and the mamma; those of the fifth and sixth nerves supply the upper digitations of the Obliquus externus abdominis}; MODALITY={sensory}; FIBERS={GSA:[BrainRegionTARGET_TEA_TRUNK Trunk,TARGET.TEA.TRUNK] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG_TX Thoracic Dorsal Root Ganglia,AVA.PN.SG.DRG.TX] -> [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_SG Substantia Gelatinosa,BMA.SC.PH.SG] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VP Ventral Posterolateral Nucleus,SMA.FD.TH.VPL]}
     * <img src="http://classconnection.s3.amazonaws.com/694/flashcards/597694/png/pectoralis_major21310847263117.png">
   * *intercostal nerves, anterior cutaneous branches*; DISTRIBUTION={run forward to the side and the forepart of the chest, supplying the skin and the mamma; those of the fifth and sixth nerves supply the upper digitations of the Obliquus externus abdominis}
    * *intercostobrachial nerve* (MA:[http://www.oluwoleogunranti.com/course/course1/nerves/intercostobrachial.htm INTERCOSTOBRACHIAL NERVE]); ORIGIN={T2-T3, lateral cutaneous branch of the 2nd intercostal nerve}; DISTRIBUTION={two nerves arising from the intercostal nerves and supplying the skin of the upper limb}; MODALITY={sensory}; FIBERS={GSA:[BrainRegionTARGET_TEA_HAND Hand,TARGET.TEA.HAND] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG_TX Thoracic Dorsal Root Ganglia,AVA.PN.SG.DRG.TX] -> [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_SG Substantia Gelatinosa,BMA.SC.PH.SG] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VP Ventral Posterolateral Nucleus,SMA.FD.TH.VPL]}
     * *first intercostobrachial nerve*; ORIGIN={second intercostal nerve}; DISTRIBUTION={skin on back and medial aspect of arm}
     * *second intercostobrachial nerve*; ORIGIN={third intercostal nerve}; DISTRIBUTION={skin of axilla and medial aspect of arm, supplies breast areola}
     * <img src="http://classconnection.s3.amazonaws.com/269/flashcards/1797269/png/axilla1346722704234.png">
    * *thoracic breast nerves*; MODALITY={somatic}; FIBERS={GSA:[BrainRegionTARGET_TEA_BREAST Breast,TARGET.TEA.BREAST] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG_TX Thoracic Dorsal Root Ganglia,AVA.PN.SG.DRG.TX] -> [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_SG Substantia Gelatinosa,BMA.SC.PH.SG] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VP Ventral Posterolateral Nucleus,SMA.FD.TH.VPL]}
     * *4th intercostal nerve*; DISTRIBUTION={supplies breast nipple, areola}
     * *5th intercostal nerve*; DISTRIBUTION={supplies breast areola}
     * <img src="http://o.quizlet.com/i/WM82O-qf8wi2b2MsP-NiDw.jpg">
    * *intercostal muscular somatic nerves*; MODALITY={somatic}; FIBERS={GSA:[BrainRegionTARGET_TEA_TRUNK Trunk,TARGET.TEA.TRUNK] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG_TX Thoracic Dorsal Root Ganglia,AVA.PN.SG.DRG.TX] -> [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_SG Substantia Gelatinosa,BMA.SC.PH.SG] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VP Ventral Posterolateral Nucleus,SMA.FD.TH.VPL]}
     * *6th intercostal nerve*; DISTRIBUTION={musculus obliquus abdominis externus}
     * *7th intercostal nerve*; DISTRIBUTION={musculus obliquus abdominis externus, musculus transversus abdominis}
     * <img src="http://i223.photobucket.com/albums/dd230/healthy-back/Obliquus_abdominis_externus_side_1.jpg">
     * *8th intercostal nerve*; DISTRIBUTION={musculus obliquus abdominis externus, musculus obliquus abdominis internus, musculus transversus abdominis}
     * *9th intercostal nerve*; DISTRIBUTION={musculus obliquus abdominis externus, musculus obliquus abdominis internus, musculus transversus abdominis}
     * <img src="http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Og3Nfr6vB-s/T3RpgqkjxaI/AAAAAAAAAmo/GzrWmAHkYVI/s320/Abdominal_Anat.jpeg">
     * *10th intercostal nerve*; DISTRIBUTION={musculus obliquus abdominis externus, musculus obliquus abdominis internus, musculus transversus abdominis}
     * *11th intercostal nerve*; DISTRIBUTION={musculus obliquus abdominis externus, musculus obliquus abdominis internus, musculus transversus abdominis}
     * <img src="https://www.scienceofmassage.com/dnn/som/journal/1307/FIG.%203%20INTERCOST.jpg">
  * *subcostal nerve, sensory* (MA:[http://www.oluwoleogunranti.com/course/course1/nerves/ne219.htm SUBCOSTAL NERVE]); ORIGIN={anterior branch of twelfth thoracic nerve}; DISTRIBUTION={skin of lower abdomen and lateral side of gluteal region, parts of abdominal transverse, oblique, and rectus muscles, and usually the pyramidal muscle, and adjacent peritoneum, musculus quadratus lumborum}; MODALITY={general sensory}; FIBERS={GSA:[BrainRegionTARGET_TEA_TRUNK Trunk,TARGET.TEA.TRUNK] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG_TX Thoracic Dorsal Root Ganglia,AVA.PN.SG.DRG.TX] -> [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_SG Substantia Gelatinosa,BMA.SC.PH.SG] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VP Ventral Posterolateral Nucleus,SMA.FD.TH.VPL]}
   * <img src="http://www.cixip.com/Public/kindeditor/attached/image/20121122/20121122135445_48690.jpg">

= THORACIC NERVES - SYMPATHETIC FIBERS =

  * *thoracic sympatetic chain ganglia* (MA:[http://www.oluwoleogunranti.com/course/course1/nerves/ne324.htm THORACIC SYMPATHETIC TRUNK & GANGLIA])
   * *intercostal nerves, sympathetic fibers*; ORIGIN={gray rami communicants}; DISTRIBUTION={muscles, vasomotor thoracic nerves to mammary gland T1-T5}; MODALITY={sympathetic}; FIBERS={GVE:[BrainRegionAVA_SC_IZ_IML Intermediolateral Nucleus,AVA.SC.IZ.IML] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG_TX Thoracic Dorsal Root Ganglia,AVA.PN.SG.DRG.TX] -> [BrainRegionTARGET_TEA_TRUNK Trunk,TARGET.TEA.TRUNK],[BrainRegionTARGET_TEA_BREAST Breast,TARGET.TEA.BREAST]}
   * *thoracic sympatetic fibers, meningeal branches*; DISTRIBUTION={spinal minengles and perivascular plexuses}; MODALITY={sympathetic}; FIBERS={GVE:[BrainRegionAVA_SC_IZ_IML Intermediolateral Nucleus,AVA.SC.IZ.IML] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG_TX Thoracic Dorsal Root Ganglia,AVA.PN.SG.DRG.TX] -> [BrainRegionTARGET_TSA_MINDCOVER Mind Cover,TARGET.TSA.MINDCOVER]}
   * <img src="http://www.netteranatomy.com/common/showimage.cfm?bFlag=0&type=f&imgFile=325-X3385.jpg">
  * *celiac ganglion* (MA:[http://www.oluwoleogunranti.com/course/course1/nerves/ne336.htm CELIAC GANGLION])
   * *greater thoracic splanchnic nerve* (MA:[http://www.oluwoleogunranti.com/course/course1/nerves/ne291.htm GREATER SPLANCHNIC NERVE]); ORIGIN={thoracic sympathetic trunk and fifth through tenth thoracic GANGLIA}; DISTRIBUTION={descending through the diaphragm or its aortic openings, ends in celiac ganglia and plexuses, with a splanchnic ganglion commonly occurring near the diaphragm}; MODALITY={preganglionic sympathetic and visceral afferent}; FIBERS={GVE:[BrainRegionAVA_SC_IZ_IML Intermediolateral Nucleus,AVA.SC.IZ.IML] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SYM_CEG Celiac Ganglion,AVA.PN.SYM.CEG] -> [BrainRegionTARGET_TEA_STOMACH Stomach,TARGET.TEA.STOMACH],[BrainRegionTARGET_TEA_LIVER Liver,TARGET.TEA.LIVER]}
   * <img src="http://www.med.umich.edu/lrc/coursepages/m1/anatomy2010/html/modules/intro_autonomics_2_module/Files/symp_adrenal.jpg">
  * *aorticorenal ganglion* (MA:[http://www.oluwoleogunranti.com/course/course1/nerves/ne334.htm AORTICORENAL GANGLION])
   * <img src="http://web.uni-plovdiv.bg/stu1104541018/docs/res/anatomy_atlas_-_Patrick_W._Tank/4%20-%20The%20Thorax_files/C4FF46.jpg">
   * *lowest splanchnic nerve* (MA:[http://www.oluwoleogunranti.com/course/course1/nerves/ne301.htm LEAST SPLANCHNIC NERVE]); ORIGIN={T12,last GANGLION of sympathetic trunk or lesser splanchnic nerve}; DISTRIBUTION={T12, aorticorenal ganglion and adjacent plexus}; MODALITY={sympathetic and visceral afferent}; FIBERS={GVE:[BrainRegionAVA_SC_IZ_IML Intermediolateral Nucleus,AVA.SC.IZ.IML] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SYM_SMG Aorticorenal Ganglion,AVA.PN.SYM.AOR] -> [BrainRegionTARGET_TEA_URETER Urinary Bladder,TARGET.TEA.URETER]}
   * <img src="http://0.tqn.com/d/urology/1/5/K/-/-/-/Female-Urinary-Tract-400.jpg">
   * <img src="https://uvahealth.com/Plone/ebsco_images/2459.jpg">
  * *superior mesenteric ganglion* (MA:[http://www.oluwoleogunranti.com/course/course1/nerves/ne319.htm SUPERIOR MESENTERIC GANGLION])
   * *lesser splanchnic nerve* (MA:[http://www.oluwoleogunranti.com/course/course1/nerves/ne305.htm LESSER SPLANCHNIC NERVE]); ORIGIN={T9-T11 GANGLIA of sympathetic trunk}; BRANCHES={renal branch}; DISTRIBUTION={pierces the diaphragm, joins the aorticorenal ganglion and celiac plexus, and communicates with the renal and superior mesenteric plexuses}; MODALITY={preganglionic sympathetic and visceral afferent}; FIBERS={GVE:[BrainRegionAVA_SC_IZ_IML Intermediolateral Nucleus,AVA.SC.IZ.IML] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SYM_SMG Superior Mesenteric Ganglion,AVA.PN.SYM.SMG] -> [BrainRegionTARGET_TEA_STOMACH Stomach,TARGET.TEA.STOMACH]}
   * <img src="http://classconnection.s3.amazonaws.com/376/flashcards/598376/jpg/splanchnic_31335351279037.jpg">
